DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effectiveness Core stabilization exercise pain intensity rest , functional disability , lumbar movement ability perform reposition task ( joint position sense ) patient subacute non-specific low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Core Stabilization Exercise Patients With Subacute Non-Specific Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare effectiveness Core stabilization exercise physical therapy pain intensity rest , functional disability , lumbar movement ability perform reposition task ( joint position sense ) patient subacute non-specific low back pain . There 2 group receive 2 different kind intervention : treatment group receive core stabilization exercise ( CSE ) control group receive physical therapy include therapeutic ultrasound hydrocollator pack . Each intervention perform 7 week . The patient assess outcome measure baseline , 7 week intervention , 1- month follow-up
DOC.criteria: Onset back pain within 6 12 week participant history back pain period 6 month prior current episode . Pain intensity measure numerical rating scale ( 010 NRS ) score pain least 3 10 . Never receive treatment core stabilization exercise ( CSE ) 3 month participate study . Pregnancy Onset serious spinal pathology : spinal fracture , spinal tumor spinal infection . Cauda equina syndrome . Presented least 2 3 sign neurological deficit
